info.name: [SH17A] Mandelbrot dive
info.description: Use the mouse to aim your dive, there are lots of strange things to explore. Don't press play or it will be very hard to steer quickly, so just leave it paused and move the mouse carefully. Keep the mouse near the boundary of black and color for the best.

renderpass.code: #define mainImage( o, i ) vec2 r=iResolution.xy;o = texture(iChannel0, (.9*i+.1*iMouse.xy)/r);vec2 c = (i-r/2.)/1e1;if(iMouse.z<1.){ o.xyzw = (i-r/2.).xyxy/1e2;} else if(length(o)<4.) {o.xy = mat2(o.xy,-o.y,o.x)*o.xy+o.zw;}
